_description: A proverbial couplet, with Latin version

OxfBal354.Transcription: In a bussshell of wynnyngeys not a hondfull of cunnyng
OxfBal354.Note:
In a collection of 55 proverbs in Latin and English; translating
                        ‘In modico rendi non est vola plena sciendi’, which
                    follows.
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
                    of Oxford, Balliol MS 354.
         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).

Flügel,  Ewald. 
             “Liedersammlungen des XVI Jahrhunderts….” 
             Anglia
         26 (1903): 94-285: 203.
Dyboski,  R.,
                        ed.  
             Songs, Carols and Other Miscellaneous Poems from Balliol MS. 354,

EETS
